name: Outbreak (itch) (WinBlah12)
description:
OUTBREAK

A game I made for a competition with my friend. You navigate through a small white platform, dodging purple viruses. If you come in contact with the virus, you become a virus. Contains 7 levels of rage-inducing fun. Some of the levels are rather hard. Totally free. Based off a brackeys tutorial. All comments and feedback welcome. Currently working to make it better for Mac OS and perhaps even Linux or Android.

OUTBREAK CONTROLS

Use A and D or Left and Right arrows to move the cube left and right. That’s literally it. Also, press esc to quit.
